page.title: 17THE HEDGES FAMILY
page.content: On July 27th 1984 I moved into a house in{Bradley.}Now we have been here for one year.The house we are living in is having an extension .My Dad and Grandad are working on the extension at home.My Mum and Dad both work in {Derby. My Mum works as a secretary and my Dad is an electrician in a new hospital.There are four people in our family.I have one sister called Claire and I am called June.We come from {Germany,}where my sister,my Mum and I were born.My Dad was born in {England},he comes from{Derby. Our house is called{"Yewtree Cottage".}It is called that because there are lots of Yew trees around it.My sister and I both go to{Bradley school. {By June Hedges.
